data.title: Akira Kurosawa
data.text:
Born: 23-Mar-1910

Birthplace: Tokyo, Japan

Died: 6-Sep-1998

Location of death: Tokyo, Japan

Cause of death: Stroke

Remains: Buried, Anyo-ji Temple Cemetery, Kamakura, Japan

Gender: Male

Race or Ethnicity: Asian

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Film Director, Author

Nationality: Japan

Executive summary: Yojimbo

Father: Isamu (d. 8-Feb-1948)

Mother: Shima (d. 4-Nov-1952)

Brother: Masayasu

Brother: Heigo (d. 1933 suicide)

Sister: Momoyo (d. 1920)

Wife: Yoko Yaguchi (m. 21-May-1945, d. 1-Feb-1985)

Son: Hisao (b. 20-Dec-1945)

Daughter: Kazuko (b. 29-Apr-1954)

High School: Keika-Gakuen Chugaku

French Legion of Honor 1984

Kyoto Prize 1994

Oscar (honorary) 1989

Suicide Attempt 22-Dec-1971

Japanese Ancestry

Risk Factors: Depression

FILMOGRAPHY AS DIRECTOR

Madadayo (17-Apr-1993)

Rhapsody in August (May-1991)

Dreams (11-May-1990)

Ran (25-Sep-1985)

Kagemusha (26-Apr-1980)

Dersu Uzala (Jul-1975)

Dodesukaden (31-Oct-1970)

Red Beard (4-Mar-1965)

High and Low (1-Mar-1963)

Sanjuro (1-Jan-1962)

Yojimbo (25-Apr-1961)

The Bad Sleep Well (4-Sep-1960)

The Hidden Fortress (28-Dec-1958)

The Lower Depths (17-Sep-1957)

Throne of Blood (15-Jan-1957)

I Live in Fear (22-Nov-1955)

The Seven Samurai (26-Apr-1954)

Ikiru (9-Oct-1952)

The Idiot (23-May-1951)

Rashomon (25-Aug-1950)

Scandal (30-Apr-1950)

Stray Dog (17-Oct-1949)

Drunken Angel (27-Apr-1948)

No Regrets for Our Youth (29-Oct-1946)

The Men Who Tread on the Tiger's Tail (1945)

Sanshiro Sugata (25-Mar-1943)
